title: The Great Macarthy [DVD]
creator_credit: Stony Creek Films and David Baker
brief_description: The hilarious story of Macarthy (John Jarratt) a nice young fellow, his life, loves and our Great Australian game, Aussie Rules Football. Macarthy is the local football star who is scouted by the tycoon president of a leading football club. He leaves his home town (where he’s lived all his life) and is taken to the bright lights of the big city where he begins to lead a life of fame and debauchery. An acclaimed comedy in a similar vein to “The Club” by David Williamson. Also available on VHS [308069].
